Comments_List: not only stats skills but more importantly, a comprehensive sort of understanding to guarantee its right application.
By taking this course I learned how to understand statistics, analyze and display data in proper ways to answer research questions or solve problems.

I think Jonathan's organization of class and engagement with students are close to perfect--if not already! Even if I'm gonna be very picky I have nothing but my full appreciation for that.

The only and minor part is for the TFs, I think I often received emails from them to say that their office hours changed, probably at least once a week from different TFs. Though it didn't affect me but probably in the future there could be more commitment to the set-up schedule.
I would totally recommend this class to anyone who needs stats and ask me--best ever compared to those I took in different places in my different stages!

Yes. I consider taking this course to be necessary for every student who is interested in statistics but doesn't have any previous experience of studying it. The course moves on quite fast but easy to follow in fact.
